alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 11:12PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rockingham and southern Strafford Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Derry, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Derry, Hampton, Durham, Exeter, Salem, Litchfield, Epping, Brentwood, Greenland, Seabrook, Stratham, Newmarket, Newington, Raymond, Hudson, Londonderry, Hampstead, Atkinson, Kingston and Auburn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 6 and 16. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford
